A Taste of Timeless Sophistication.

Our Story

A masterful collaboration

The Latin phrase “Omne trium perfectum” translates to everything that comes in threes is perfect or complete. That was how the name Les Trois was chosen not only with an aim towards perfection but also incorporating our mission, vision and values of the company.

N.B “Weather, Terroir and the People” - the three key elements to making perfect wine

READ OUR STORY

We work exclusively with skilled wine masters to produce excellent crafted wines that retain unique heritage and character.

OUR VINEYARDS

Our Wines

We are passionate about making wines that bring together great company and will be the centerpiece of unique connections and experiences.

“There is a crazy level of class and concentration here with so much density and also freshness it is incredible. Black ink and meaty spice mark the plum-drenched fruit. This is a heroic wine."

- MATTHEW JUKES

"Fragrant and very attractive on the nose, this is a modern and silky wine with smart oak and a youthful tang of acidity on the back of the palate. Well-made and classic, I like it."

- MATTHEW JUKES

"Very impressive with a superb, floral nose, this wine uses quite a lot of oak and this comes through in a dry finish, which is currently a little out of balance with the rest of the experience. Nonetheless, this is a wonderful wine with a well- formed character."

- MATTHEW JUKES
